Penn State senior guard Mike Walker isnt having fun playing basketball right now PERIOD

Not in the midst of a fourgame losing streak PERIOD Not with

the way the Nittany Lions are losing PERIOD

Walker noted that as the second half of Penn States blowout loss against Purdue mercilessly dragged on Wednesday night not one Lion was smiling or laughing PERIOD What reason did they have

But Walker said things will be fun again for Penn State   Big Ten if it can get its season back on track PERIOD That starts with winning on the road against Iowa when the Lions take on the Hawkeyes at  p.m PERIOD tomorrow at CarverHawkeye Arena PERIOD

 Walker said PERIOD 

Neither Penn State nor Iowa has had much recent success PERIOD The Lions are currently on a fourgame losing skid on the heels of a sevengame winning streak PERIOD Their last three losses have come by an average of  points PERIOD

Iowa   has fared only slightly better as of late winning two of its last four PERIOD The Hawkeyes however put themselves at a deficit by dropping their first three Big Ten games PERIOD

Both teams have struggled offensively primarily because of poor shooting PERIOD They each rank in the bottom half of the Big Ten in field goal 3point and free throw percentage PERIOD Iowa is last in the conference in total offense averaging a paltry  points per game PERIOD Penn State has a better season average . for the year but has scored  per game since senior Geary Claxton was injured against Wisconsin PERIOD

 Penn State coach Ed DeChellis said of the teams loss to Purdue PERIOD 

A oncepromising season for the Lions appears to be slipping away as the losses continue to mount PERIOD Walker who has suffered through some trying years of Penn State basketball is hoping the team can turn things around to avoid another disappointing season PERIOD

The Lions have  more regular season games to reverse their fortunes PERIOD

 Walker said PERIOD
